headline: ‘I was asked to design Coca-Cola’s Christmas ads after drawing on a box of tea’
summary: Gush Mundae, 53, won his first advertising accounts by posting old boxes of tea to prospective clients, asking if they fancied a cuppa. Now, he runs a multimillion-pound advertising company, Bulletproof.
